question: Which General Assembly of Association of World Election Bodies (A-WEB) was held at Bengaluru, Karnataka on 3rd September 2019?
explanation: The Election Commission of India hosted the 4th General Assembly of Association of World Election Bodies (A-WEB) at Bengaluru, Karnataka on 3rd September 2019. India took over as A-WEB’s Chair for the 2019-21 term. The Association of World Election Bodies (A-WEB) is the largest association of Election Management Bodies (EMBs) worldwide. A-WEB was established on October 14, 2013, with the permanent secretariat of A-WEB is located at Seoul, South Korea. A-WEB’s vision is to foster efficiency and effectiveness in conducting free, fair, transparent and participative elections worldwide.
